description: Installing 'tailwind' css via 'npm' as devDependencies ``` js npm install -D tailwindcss ``` Creating 'tailwind.config.js' file ``` js npx tailwindcss init ``` Configuring my 'tailwind.config.js' file ``` js /** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */ module.exports = {   content: ["./src/**/*.{html,js}"],   theme: {     extend: {},   },   plugins: [], } ``` Adding tailwind css directives to my css file ``` js @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities; ```
